Posts.EditableText:
Just wanted to get a consensus on a mid/midi file thing to see if its something i'm doing wrong or something that needs to be fixed with quest.

i'm calling a "subways.mid" file to loop via:

playmidi <sounds\subways.mid; loop>

it only plays about 1/3 of the way through before stopping and looping again.  has anyone else had this problem with mid and midi files?
Posts.HTML:
Just wanted to get a consensus on a mid/midi file thing to see if its something i'm doing wrong or something that needs to be fixed with quest.

Posts.EditableText: as an update, i just decided to re-xport it for the umpth time, and lo and behold, it works...tada.  so i have to think it's on my end, although i didn't change anything for the last export.  weird wild stuff.
